extendedInfo.description: This app contains the scientific program for the APS March Meeting 2013, March 18-22, 2013 in Baltimore, Maryland.App Keywords: Meeting, Physics Meeting, March Meeting 2013, APS Physics

reviews.title: Continuous crash
reviews.comment: App started a seemingly infinite loop of crashing as soon as I started it the first time.  Even after phone restart, it continued until I uninstalled.
reviews.author: Dave Rench

reviews.title: For a first try, it\'s ... surprisingly useful.
reviews.comment: I\'m upping this to 3 stars.  It still needs a way to search authors and sessions, not to mention finding second authors on papers.  But today I found it surprisingly useful.  Needs a lot of work for next year, though.  ORIGINAL REVIEW:   I gave it the second star only because this is a first try.  The good news:  I didn\'t have any trouble loading it, as others did.  The bad?  Well, let me count the ways:  There are 8400 papers at this meeting, which means 8000+ authors.  To find a given author, you have to scroll through every name.  Good luck looking for Zybenski.  There are sessions from A1 through Z47, Monday AM through Friday Noon.  Want to find P16? You\'ve got a lot of scrolling to do.  No search function or keyboard input I could see.  And it\'s a good thing I figured out that clicking the little ribbon would add a talk to my schedule, because there\'s no help I could find, either.  No integration with my calendar, either, though I can download an .ics from the APS web site.  As I said, a first try.  I saw a sign about a feedback session, where we can suggest improvements.  If I can find it on the app, I\'ll go. :-(
reviews.author: Mike Mehl

reviews.title: Wish I\'d used earlier
reviews.comment: Need to add a feature to import or access my schedule from the website!  Ran okay on my device. I used the online schedule planner mostly but the internet at the conference is terrible and the webpage seem like it is overwhelmed.  it has been unavailable using my 3g network. If I had used this to favorite talks this may have been a great help.
reviews.author: Steve Howell

reviews.title: Cannot run.  Period.
reviews.comment: Same thing happens as with other reviewer.  Loads only to 10% and crashes.  Crashes continuously afterwards or whenever the phone is restarted.
reviews.author: Tyler Park

reviews.title: Very big, kind of slow, but it works
reviews.comment: Warning: Make sure you have a fast connection the first time you launch the app since it will download about 50 MB of data. It will say it\'s \"initializing 10%\" the entire time.  It will run a background app for syncing at all times that consumes 5 MB of memory.
reviews.author: Kazem Edmond

reviews.comment: Ok app, but could be much better
reviews.author: Sergiy Bubin
